CustomField.description: Number of days excluding weekends between NEP Pass to WC Underwriting and NEP Received from WC Underwriting. If either field is blank, this field will be null
CustomField.formula: If (OR(ISNULL( NEP_Pass_to_WC_Underwriting__c ),ISNULL( NEP_Received_from_WC_Underwriting__c )) , NULL ,(NEP_Received_from_WC_Underwriting__c - NEP_Pass_to_WC_Underwriting__c) - 2*( floor((NEP_Received_from_WC_Underwriting__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((NEP_Pass_to_WC_Underwriting__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7)))
CustomField.label: NEPs in WC UW Timeframe
